thread.section_title: Lanzerac Hotel & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Two day business Trip
thread.title_full: Two day business Trip - Review of Lanzerac Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Mark S
title: Two day business Trip
text:
I have stayed here before on business a few years ago, and it's as good as I remember. Everything here is first class. Beautiful spacious rooms, great staff, lovely food, spectacular bathrooms and the attention to detail cannot be faulted. A huge plus is the location - it's close enough to Stellenbosch central (a few minutes drive) but far enough away to get that real country/winelands experience
Room Tip: 215 was the room I stayed in See more room tips
